text: "Vehicles transporting & freezers storing the #COVID19 #vaccine need to be monitored in real time ... #data increasingly comes from #IoT sensors, [and] #machinelearning algorithms can be used [for] #analytics" by @howellsrichard @gross_alinaa via @forbes https://t.co/kCKN8CkJoX https://t.co/2gVxejqDka
